UI: Content Card

Review Card

The Review Card displays customer reviews, testimonials, and ratings. Features star rating (1-5), review text, reviewer information, review date, verified purchase status, helpful votes, and the product/service being reviewed. Uses Schema.org/Review markup for rich snippets.
